metadata.title: CVE-2023-1017 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in TPM2.0's Module Library allowing writing of a 2-byte data past the end of TPM2.0 command in the CryptParameterDecryption routine. An attacker who can successfully exploit this vulnerability can lead to denial of service (crashing the TPM chip/process or rendering it unusable) and/or arbitrary code execution in the TPM context.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1017` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtpms0 - 0.9.3-0ubuntu1.22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtpms package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-0ubuntu1.22.10.1').
